attributes.action: Lobby for recognition for Jonathan Rea in services to Motorcycling
attributes.additional_details: He is the pride of Northern Ireland other similar people has been given awards and honours so why not Jonathan Rea???
attributes.background: Work to give Jonathan Rea recognition for what he has achieved in Motorcycling Help Jonathan Rea to be knighted or a SIR for his services to motorcycling as the BBC Sports Personality of the Year awards continue to ignore him

rejection.details: You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour at http://www.gov.uk/honours
